title.rendered: The first Annual West Africa Civil Society Conference

content.rendered:
The communique from the First Annual West Africa Civil Society Conference has been published.

The West African Civil Society Forum (WACSOF) in collaboration with the West Africa Civil Society Institute (WACSI), and with support from the FundFinity Grants, organised the First Annual West Africa Civil Society Conference from December 8 – 9 2014 in Accra, Ghana.

This conference was held under the theme: ‘Strategizing for the Post-2015 and ECOWAS 2020 Development Agenda for West Africa’.
